tweet:
context switching kills flow. so we merged docs directly into the playground.

read the ref, test the endpoint, ship the feature. one tab.

also live: qwen-character model & hardened prompt security for polly.

alt_tweet:
why tab switch when you can just build? merged docs into the playground today. seamless api testing.

plus: added qwen-character and locked down polly's system prompts.

open source, always shipping.
image_prompt: Cozy 8-bit pixel art animation style. A split screen merging into one unified workstation. Left side 'DOCS' scroll and Right side 'CODE' terminal fusing together with a lime green (#ecf874) glow. A happy pixel bee mascot coding in flow state. Warm pastel gradient background, soft lighting, nostalgic Stardew Valley vibes. Text overlay in pixel font: 'FLOW STATE'.
reasoning: Focuses on a specific UX pain point (context switching) that developers relate to. Shows we value their time/workflow. Mentions the model updates as a value-add.
